pkgmetadata.longdescription:
quickshell-polkit-agent is a lightweight polkit authentication agent designed for integration with quickshell configurations. It provides a simple IPC interface that allows quickshell to create custom authentication dialogs while leveraging the secure polkit-qt backend for actual authentication.
Features: - Direct polkit-qt integration for security - IPC communication with quickshell - Custom authentication UI support - Minimal resource usage - Qt6 based architecture
